Package digit_recognizer

Class StreamingRecognition

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • digit_recognizer.StreamingRecognition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class StreamingRecognition
extends java.lang.Thread

    Class implements multi-thread capability.

    Class takes Recognizer instance and performs MnistMatrix recognition in a separate thread.

    Since:
    05.07.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Orest Maiatskyi

        private void recognizeLoop()
        Starts the recognition loop.

        The number of loop iterations is proportional to the size of testMatrices array.
